dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset designed to evaluate federated learning algorithms, where local data samples are generated based on specific distribution parameters to control Non-IIDness.
dcterms:title: Synthetic-1-1

dcterms:description: A dataset for federated learning that extends the MNIST dataset to include handwritten uppercase and lowercase letters, designed for testing federated learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: FEMNIST

dcterms:creator: B. McMahan

dcterms:description: A dataset derived from the complete works of William Shakespeare, used for next character prediction tasks in federated learning settings.
dcterms:title: Shakespeare text data
